title: Boris Johnson – 2020 Comments on Medicine Fund
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Boris Johnson, the Prime Minister, on 30 November 2020.
content:
This new £20m fund will significantly increase the capacity and resilience of our medicines and diagnostics manufacturing supply chains and equip us to fight future health crises.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
  *[UCL]: University College London
  *[HIV]: human immunodeficiency virus
  *[AI]: artificial intelligence
  *[ABI]: Association of British Insurers
  *[CMU]: Capital Markets Union
  *[IMO]: International Maritime Organization
  *[MARPOL]: International Convention for the Prevention of Pollution from Ships.
  *[UK]: United Kingdom
  *[IGF]: International Code of Safety for Ships using Gases or other Low-flashpoint Fuels
  *[COP]: Paris Climate Conference
  *[AOA]: The Airport Operators Association
  *[BATA]: British Air Transport Association
  *[OECD]: The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[PISA]: Programme for International Student Assessment
  *[PIRLS]: Progress in International Reading Literacy Study
  *[TIMSS]: Trends in International Mathematics and Science Study
  *[DCMS]: Department for Digital Culture Media & Sport
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[HR]: human resources
  *[NASBM]: National Association of School Business Management
  *[CAMHS]: Child and Adolescent Mental Health Services
  *[EPPSE]: Effective pre-school, primary and secondary education
  *[LAs]: local authorities
  *[PVIs]: private, voluntary and independents
  *[UNDP]: United Nations Development Programme
  *[BIT]: Behavioural Insights Team
  *[QOF]: Quality Outcomes Framework
  *[
  NICs
 ]: National Insurance Contributions
  *[UKTI]: UK Trade and Investment
  *[IPOs]: initial public offerings

Throughout the pandemic we have seen a coming together of British scientific industry and innovation and this new fund will enhance the UK’s manufacturing capabilities even further.
